details.description: Rather than hand-writing or typing up feedback, voice recognition software is used to capture the thoughts of the marker, as they review the work. This not only speeds up feedback text creation, but also allows the marker to work "hands-free" when reviewing submissions.
details.applicability: Work needs to be reviewed in a quiet space to ensure accuracy of voice recognition. Even then, the final written material should be reviewed for accuracy.
